014package org.jdbi.v3.sqlobject.config.internal;
015
016import java.lang.annotation.Annotation;
017import java.lang.invoke.MethodHandles;
018import java.lang.invoke.MethodType;
019import java.lang.reflect.Method;
020import java.util.Arrays;
021import java.util.Objects;
022import java.util.function.Supplier;
023import java.util.stream.Stream;
024
025import javax.annotation.Nullable;
026
027import org.jdbi.v3.core.config.ConfigRegistry;
028import org.jdbi.v3.core.internal.exceptions.Unchecked;
029import org.jdbi.v3.core.statement.SqlParser;
030import org.jdbi.v3.core.statement.SqlStatements;
031import org.jdbi.v3.sqlobject.config.Configurer;
032import org.jdbi.v3.sqlobject.config.UseSqlParser;
033
034public class UseSqlParserImpl implements Configurer {
035    @Override
036    public void configureForMethod(ConfigRegistry registry, Annotation annotation, Class<?> sqlObjectType, Method method) {
037        UseSqlParser anno = (UseSqlParser) annotation;
038        SqlParser parser = instantiate(anno.value(), sqlObjectType, method);
039        registry.get(SqlStatements.class).setSqlParser(parser);
040    }
041
042    @Override
043    public void configureForType(ConfigRegistry registry, Annotation annotation, Class<?> sqlObjectType) {
044        configureForMethod(registry, annotation, sqlObjectType, null);
045    }
046
047    private SqlParser instantiate(Class<? extends SqlParser> parserClass,
048                                  Class<?> sqlObjectType,
049                                  @Nullable Method method) {
050        return Stream.of(tryConstructor(parserClass), tryConstructor(parserClass, sqlObjectType), tryConstructor(parserClass, sqlObjectType, method))
051            .map(Supplier::get)
052            .filter(Objects::nonNull)
053            .findFirst()
054            .orElseThrow(() -> new IllegalStateException("Unable to instantiate, no viable constructor for " + parserClass.getName()));
055    }
056
057    private static <T extends SqlParser> Supplier<T> tryConstructor(Class<T> clazz, Object... args) {
058        return Unchecked.supplier(() -> {
059            try {
060                Object[] nonNullArgs = Arrays.stream(args).filter(Objects::nonNull).toArray(Object[]::new);
061                Class<?>[] argClasses = Arrays.stream(nonNullArgs).map(Object::getClass).toArray(Class[]::new);
062                MethodType type = MethodType.methodType(void.class, argClasses);
063                return clazz.cast(MethodHandles.lookup()
064                        .findConstructor(clazz, type)
065                        .invokeWithArguments(nonNullArgs));
066            } catch (NoSuchMethodException ignored) {
067                return null;
068            }
069        });
070    }
071}
